item.description:
Come join us for a FREE Intro to Wicca discussion group on
Wednesday, Sept 5th
to find out what Wicca really is, and what it is NOT.

Learn about the Wiccan beliefs and misconceptions, and some interesting tidbits that most people don't know!

This discussion group is for beginners who want to learn about
what Wicca is truly about, and also for those more ADVANCED in the craft who would like to join the discussion and learn more about the class content of my upcoming

Witchcraft Training series that begins January 29th.

Each course builds upon another, and upon completion the student will obtain the knowledge and certificate to the Level of the First Degree.

Look forward to an evening of questions and discussion, and YUMMY snacks!

Hope to see you there!:)
item.how_to_find_us: Park on the street and come in the front door! :)
item.name: FREE Intro to Wicca Discussion
